preferences.name: topic_refresh_interval
preferences.title: Stream title refresh interval
preferences.description: Amount of seconds to wait to refresh the channel topic.

preferences.name: participants_refresh_interval
preferences.title: Participant list refresh interval
preferences.description: Amount of seconds to wait to refresh the participants if the channel is over full (over 1000 participants)

preferences.name: ignored_messages
preferences.title: Hide chat messages
preferences.descriptions: You can enter multiple messages to be ignored by separating them with a comma

preferences.name: participants_adding_batch_size
preferences.title: Number of participants to add at once when batching up to de-jank

title: Twitch Chat Provider
name: twitch-provider
description: Provides a twitch network type for instantbird
author: Martin Giger (http://humanoids.be)
